name: PetSmart
description: Chain featuring a range of pets, supplies & food (most offer grooming, boarding & other services).
address: PetSmart, 2860 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4

featured_reviews.review_id: I love shopping at Petsmart for all my cat needs! This pet shop has everything you could possibly need in one place, making it super convenient. The staff is always helpful and friendly, which adds to the overall positive experience. It's my go-to pet store, and I'm always happy with my visits.
featured_reviews.review_text: I love shopping at Petsmart for all my cat needs! This pet shop has everything you could possibly need in one place, making it super convenient. The staff is always helpful and friendly, which adds to the overall positive experience. It's my go-to pet store, and I'm always happy with my visits.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I booked online for a full grooming. My dog is a mini aussie 23poud
She doesn't need hair cut just hair between her toes and bum
The hair wasn't cut at all she still scratching and bothered by extreme dry skin and she had dry blood on hair forehead. They didn't say anything about any accident and we noticed it after we came home.
I will never go there again

featured_reviews.review_id: Our pup Cali gets her haircut every couple months here.  5 Stars! Pet Smart Team communicates well and treats her great and haircuts looks awesome. Marcelle E cut Cali today 5/5 recommend!!!!
featured_reviews.review_text: Our pup Cali gets her haircut every couple months here.  5 Stars! Pet Smart Team communicates well and treats her great and haircuts looks awesome. Marcelle E cut Cali today 5/5 recommend!!!!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Have you ever tried to move a family of 4 to Vancouver island? It's extremely stressful. I booked an appointment for our dog to be groomed so she would be out of the house when the movers arrived and the friends she would stay at for 3 days while we moved asked that she be groomed to prevent shedding on their furniture. I woke up on moving day at 6:30 to walk the dog and brush her before her appointment. I showed up on time only to be told the appointment was cancelled because staff called in sick. I wasn't offered any alternative and they wouldn't even let me buy any products in the store because "it was too early" even though I saw a bunch of staff in there. I called all the other grooming shops in the area and they are all full for today. Now I have movers showing up and nowhere to put my dog for the day. It's too hot to leave her in the car. And I can't take her to my friend's house for the next couple of days Because she hasn't been groomed as was asked. I work in the service industry and I understand people call in sick. But sometimes you have to buckle down and make it work. A manager might need to step in and pick up some grooming, shears, or else you need to take five minutes off every appointment in the day in order to squeeze in an extra client or else work a little bit later. I'm very disappointed with the lack of sympathy, lack of effort to rectify their own issue. From now on I'll stick to the little guys. They're cheaper anyway.

** update  I couldn't help but call in and talk to the manager. He was kind and offered another appointment on another day as well as a credit. It didn't help us out the day of and would've been nice if they had offered this during the initial visit.

5 stars for the quality of the care/grooming of my pet

featured_reviews.review_id: It's always a pleasure to stop at this Petsmart location. As soon you walk in, the cashier is happily greeting you and welcoming you.
featured_reviews.review_text: It's always a pleasure to stop at this Petsmart location. As soon you walk in, the cashier is happily greeting you and welcoming you.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Super polite staff, amazing with animals (big surprise), always a friendly face awaiting you.

I can't speak highly enough of this team.

Average prices, great and amazing selection. Generally go here for all my pet needs!
featured_reviews.review_text:

Average prices, great and amazing selection. Generally go here for all my pet needs!

featured_reviews.review_id: This store have a vast array of things for every pets needs. I love just looking through their inventory. The staff that was there on my visit was not very friendly or helpful.  That shouldn't discourage anyone from exploring this great store.
featured_reviews.review_text: This store have a vast array of things for every pets needs. I love just looking through their inventory. The staff that was there on my visit was not very friendly or helpful.  That shouldn't discourage anyone from exploring this great store.

featured_reviews.review_id: Friendly staff and a very clean store! The displays of the store are well thought out and the staff were very courteous and helpful! They also accept manufacture coupons here which is a great way to save a few dollars! Nice to see a wide variety of foods for your cats and dogs!

They also accept manufacture coupons here which is a great way to save a few dollars! Nice to see a wide variety of foods for your cats and dogs!
